alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Patrick (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 1:49PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Carroll and southwestern Patrick Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 149 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Laurel Fork, or near Ararat, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Stuart... Laurel Fork... Meadows Of Dan... and Buffalo Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
